item.title: Projects
item.description: SR (Scene Recon) This project has many times at time, i wish this name was the last, the principal objective of the project is organize information on incident with a large work team. All investigators on project can contribute simultaneously with his own findings. First of all talk about project infraestructure, consist in one database build in mongodb, this database store objects of application like machines, timeline, users and roles.
